rooms.description: A welcoming foyer with traditional colonial elements and Vastu-aligned entrance facing the east.
Spacious living area adjacent to a veranda, with north-east orientation for prosperity as per Vastu principles.
Modular dining space adjoining the kitchen, designed to ensure an unobstructed flow of energy.
Fully equipped colonial-style kitchen, with a south-west orientation for stability and balance according to Vastu guidelines.
Comfortable guest bedroom with adjoining balcony overlooking the garden area, designed to enhance relaxation while observing Vastu placement principles.

openings.description: Colonial style entryway ensuring positive energy flow as per Vastu.
Separate openings leading to spacious balconies for each bedroom, promoting natural light and ventilation.
Entrance to the two-car garage integrated into the ground floor layout.
